Text:
Perfect BRRip and a fast download...
A/10  (Has English hardcoded subs when needed)
V/10
Really interesting documentary and a proper eye opener. The documentary is about the old cold war arms race and now the new arms race with the Middle East and China...
Many Thanx to sadbawang and WAF for the Excellent rip and Thanx to all the seeders for a quick download...:)
